# !!! WARNING !!! AUTO-GENERATED FILE, PLEASE DO NOT MODIFY IT AND USE
# https://docs.platformio.org/page/projectconf/section_env_build.html#build-flags
#
# If you need to override existing CMake configuration or add extra,
# please create `CMakeListsUser.txt` in the root of project.
# The `CMakeListsUser.txt` will not be overwritten by PlatformIO.



set(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES "adafruit_feather_m0;adafruit_feather_m0_debug;native;" CACHE STRING "Build Types reflect PlatformIO Environments" FORCE)

set(CLION_SVD_FILE_PATH "$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/platforms/atmelsam@src-6137f7e004c0457aa63b2eb976584bd1/misc/svd/ATSAMD21G18A.svd" CACHE FILEPATH "Peripheral Registers Definitions File" FORCE)

SET(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/bin/arm-none-eabi-gcc.exe")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/bin/arm-none-eabi-g++.exe")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "-fno-exceptions -std=gnu++11 -fno-threadsafe-statics -ggdb3 -g3 -fasynchronous-unwind-tables -Os -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -Wall -mcpu=cortex-m0plus -mthumb -nostdlib --param max-inline-insns-single=500 -Wno-expansion-to-defined")
SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "-std=gnu11 -ggdb3 -g3 -fasynchronous-unwind-tables -Os -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -Wall -mcpu=cortex-m0plus -mthumb -nostdlib --param max-inline-insns-single=500 -Wno-expansion-to-defined")

SET(CMAKE_C_STANDARD 11)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "adafruit_feather_m0_debug")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=40303')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_SAMD')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_SAMD_ZERO')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_SAMD_FEATHER_M0')
    add_definitions(-D'ARM_MATH_CM0PLUS')
    add_definitions(-D'__SAMD21G18A__')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=48000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'USBCON')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_VID=0x239A')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PID=0x800B')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PRODUCT=\"Adafruit Feather M0\"')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_MANUFACTURER=\"Adafruit\"')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_CONFIG_POWER=100')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/FSController")

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/Timer")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/SSInteface")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/SN74LVC2G53")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/FreewaveRadio")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/Controller")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/BaseModel")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/Shadow")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/Constants")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/Properties")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/Diagnostics")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/adafruit_feather_m0_debug/FeatherTrace/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/adafruit_feather_m0_debug/Plog/src")

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/adafruit_feather_m0_debug/ArduinoJson_ID64/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-samd-adafruit/cores/arduino")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-samd-adafruit/variants/feather_m0")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/Battery")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/IridiumSBD/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/SatCommDriver")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/VoltageReg")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/CircularBuffer")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/CircularHeap")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/SatComm")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/TinyFSM")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/ctti-master/src")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/adafruit_feather_m0_debug/*.*

    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=40303')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_SAMD')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_SAMD_ZERO')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_SAMD_FEATHER_M0')
    add_definitions(-D'ARM_MATH_CM0PLUS')
    add_definitions(-D'__SAMD21G18A__')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10805')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=48000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'USBCON')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_VID=0x239A')
    add_definitions(-D'USB_PID=0x800B')

    add_definitions(-D'USB_MANUFACTURER=\"Adafruit\"')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/adafruit_feather_m0/Plog/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/adafruit_feather_m0/OPEnS_RTC")

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/adafruit_feather_m0/RadioHead_ID124")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-cmsis-atmel/CMSIS/Device/ATMEL")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-samd-adafruit/cores/arduino/TinyUSB")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-samd-adafruit/variants/feather_m0")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/Battery")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/IridiumSBD/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/SatCommDriver")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/VoltageReg")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/CircularBuffer")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/CircularHeap")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/SatComm")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/TinyFSM")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/ctti-master/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-samd-adafruit/libraries/CI_Tests")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-samd-adafruit/libraries/HID")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-samd-adafruit/libraries/I2S/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-samd-adafruit/libraries/SAMD_AnalogCorrection/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-samd-adafruit/libraries/SDU/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-samd-adafruit/libraries/Servo/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-samd-adafruit/libraries/USBHost/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/adafruit_feather_m0/*.*
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libhw/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "native")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=40303')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/CircularBuffer")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/CircularHeap")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/SatComm")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/TinyFSM")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/ctti-master/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/native/*.*
    )
endif()

FILE(GLOB_RECURSE SRC_LIST
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/*.*
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/*.*
)

list(APPEND SRC_LIST ${EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES})
